service1_test module

service1_test.client()[source]

Fixture to configure the Flask app in testing mode and provide a test client.

Returns:

Flask test client

Return type:

FlaskClient

service1_test.new_customer_data()[source]

Fixture to provide data for registering a new customer.

Returns:

New customer data

Return type:

dict
